#summary Install iSphere (Server Part)

  * Start WDSCi 7.0 / RDi 8.0+.

  * Click on “Windows / Preferences”.

  * Expand the item “iSphere”.

  * Click on “Library”.

  * Click on “Transfer iSphere Library”.

  * The following window appears.

http://isphere.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/image001.png

  * Enter host, user, password and click “OK”.

  * The following window appears. 

http://isphere.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/image003.png 

  * Click “Start Transfer”. The library ISPHERE will be transferred to the host.

  * Close the window.
